p: The essential oil from S. macrostema showed high antioxidant activity in vitro (>50%) at 1 mg/mL with DPPH (53.11%) and ABTS (92.12%), activities higher or similar that those ejected by 1 mg/mL of BHT showing 30.39% and 97.23% of activity, respectively. However, at 0.1 mg/mL, the essential oil reached at 98.25% of TAC, one value greater than the effect observed with ascorbic acid (62.43%).
